name: Finding Semolina (vraja001)
description:
Where do you go when you can't trust your own senses?  

What does it feel like to walk through your mind's eye? 

"Finding Semolina" is a  magically realist adventure about finding ingredients in worlds hidden behind spice jars. This cooking game is visually psychedelic. It's a VR experience that will literally have you grasping at straws in absurd sequences, as you piece together your story.

Explore rich environments and scavenge for memories, while following a mother-daughter relationship twisted by time. Let your imagination guide you through this colorful dreamscape...just don't lose your grip on reality. 

Optimised for the Rift S. 

Featuring original voice acting from Yalini Thambinayagam, Venu,  Krishan and Viji Rajaratnam.
